modules.description: Provides bitwise manipulation functions for 64-bit integers, including shifts, masks, and bitwise combinations. Works with custom bit-vector types derived from integers. Used to generate optimized hardware description code for digital circuits.

Extracts location information from AST nodes and validates it against expected values. Constructs and transforms expressions representing constants and arithmetic operations with signed or unsigned semantics. Rewrites parse tree elements using custom mapping logic for code generation or analysis tasks.
